sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: STUFF, in commerce, a general name for all kinds of ſabrics of gold, ſilver, ſilk, wool, hair, cotton, or thread, manufactured on the loom ; of which number are velvets, brocades, mohairs, ſatins, taffetas, cloths, ſerges, &c.
